DOC.brief_summary: This trial obese subject poor lipid control without Type 2 diabetes mellitus study safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics multiple dos PF-05231023
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study Of PF-05231023 In Adult Subjects Who Have Poor Lipid Control With And Without Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Male female subject nonchildbearing potential age 30 70 year without diagnosis Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( accord American Diabetes Association guideline ) . Subjects poor lipid control confirm laboratory test . BMI 30 40 Kg/m2 total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Levels blood enzymes indicate pancreatitis elevate liver function enzyme outside laboratory 's reference range confirm laboratory test . Subjects Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus .
